raw_text: DALPADADO – PREETHEE SONALI (nee HERAT) Dearly beloved wife of Srilal. Precious mother of Kusal and Anya. Loved mother-in-law of Danoj Gamage and Darling grandmother of Devin. Beloved daughter of the late Jayatissa and late Marie herat. Sister of late Dr. Uthum and of Saliya and Rosita,​ Sirinath and Nelun and Mihiri and Miran Rambukwella. Cortege leaves A. F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Monday 30th October After funeral service at 1.30 p.m.,​ followed by cremation at the new crematorium at Borella Cemetery at 2.30 p.m.069651
